title: I'm getting this notice trying to launch the game

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: The launcher doesn't even open, can somebody help me?

replies.body: This error usually indicates a security setting with your OS that's preventing game files from being accessed.  Check out our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings and allow access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thank you very much! It helped a lot!
